.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.2 (2014-07-08)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* Flush delfate buffer for each message.

0.1.1 (2014-07-07)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* Fix packaging stream submodule.
* Send queued messages before closing socket.
* Continue to read from socket on EAGAIN


0.1.0 (2014-07-07)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* First release on PyPI.
